website_summaries.verdict: If you like liquid eyeliners, this one works almost like a pen and is easy to control.
pros: Liquid eyeliner with a pen-like tip that's designed for creating controlled, precise lines like a cat eye
Applies without tugging, and dries fairly quickly
If you like vivid colors, choose one of the darker, bolder shades
cons: Some shades aren't very pigmented, and may require layering if you like a bold look
Has the tendency to smudge throughout the day

customer_reviews.title: Raccoon eyes
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this a try. Was smeared under my eyes in 4 hrs. I have yet to find a eyeliner that will stay on my oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy J

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eyeliner. It’s easy to use and stays on well. I’ve been using it for over 2 yrs and like it better than the Lancôme liner that I used for years before trying this at the advice of an associate at Ulta. I’ve purchased it several times now from amazon and it’s the same product I was buying at Ulta, but for almost half the price! It’s very accurate, it’s like art for your eyes!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Consistency
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks ago, Too Faced waterproof eyeliner arrived on my doorstep. Skeptical, albeit hopeful, I put this eyeliner to the challenge of remaining on after a day in the Arizona sun. Well, after this day of experimentation, wouldn't you know, my house was broken into and violently burglarized. After hours of work in the office, tears and sweat at home in this arduous recovery process, the only thing which remained consistent in my life was Too Faced waterproof eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Rose

customer_reviews.title: Water and sweat proof
customer_reviews.text: I got this at Ulta a couple years back and was extremely happy to see it on Amazon! I wear about 20lbs of equipment all year for work, so it's easy to break a sweat here and there. I love that this product doesn't run off or smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable
customer_reviews.text: This product is impeccable. Affordable, high quality makeup. No bleeding/smudging, quick dry, sharp tip for drawing. Definitely waterproof. Won't be buying any other eyeliner until further notice! Only comparable product is Eyeko brand eyeliner, to me.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Confirmed Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner actually REALLY works. It stays on until you rub it off. So it’s great, but beware that the miscellaneous water formula won’t work on it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sharp line, pigmented, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner makes a great sharp line. The ink is super pigmented, you only have to draw it once, there's no need to go over the line again to get it dark enough.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N Jones

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Delivery, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used the charcoal color of this liquid eyeliner previously. The black is more of what I was looking for and it doesn't want to come off meaning it has some serious staying power. The previous product I used would come off if I even touched it, so keep that in mind. The black is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Works but
customer_reviews.text: This liner stays on really well. I'm an ER nurse and I get sweaty frequently at work, and often change into clothes and update my makeup if I'm going out after a shift. This eyeliner stays put! However, I find the tip really hard to use for a wing. It's pretty fat and it doesn't bend much. I typically like felt tip but I completely stopped using this because it always takes me several tries to get the liner right due to the difficulty to use. I wouldn't buy it again, but if you are a pro or looking for a fat tip, this might be for you!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: My 19-year-old daughter suggested I try her two-faced eyeliner. I love it. It took me a couple times to get used to applying it. For the over fifty crowd, it is NOT an eyeliner pencil it is a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner has lasted me at least 5-6 months, granted, I don’t do my makeup except for maybe once or twice every two weeks. But it has a very nice edge and can capture the perfect wing
customer_reviews.author: Concisus.carlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice color saturation
customer_reviews.text: This liner is a great value for the money and the color is nice and saturated. The pen line is very thin so it takes a second to get used to if you have been using a thicker pen.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyPot

customer_reviews.title: Will last!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It will not smear or come off throughout the day. I have to use coconut oil to get it off at night.
customer_reviews.author: meowlanie

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 stars as has nice felt-tip point. Is NOT waterproof! Smudges & smears if anything touches it: tears, water, accidental swipe. Don’t buy if you want waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: J W Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is so precise and dark after one pass. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L.roths

customer_reviews.title: Won’t budge! Perfect matte black!
customer_reviews.text: Tested in shower on my hand. Didn’t come all the way off even with soap. Doesn’t smudge under vigorous rubbing and finally...just took a NAP in it. Still flawless as can be seen!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Musaev

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced Never Dissapoints!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner blows the Kat Von D tattoo liner out of the water. The super sharp tip allows for precision application aka them perfect wings ladies!!!!! Don’t think twice, this one will be your new fave!
customer_reviews.author: Elle B

customer_reviews.title: Was happy until an hour into the day
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is definitely a good quality at first glance. I loved it until it smeared extremely bad as soon as it gets a little warm out. I've even tried putting powder on it to make it stay longer and it helps a little bit but after about an hour of being outside, even if it's just 60 degrees out, it smears all over my eyes and I find myself looking into the mirror to rub it off of my eyelid crease. It stays black all day but gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this is actually a too faced product, does not dry stays sticky and gets everywhere, I use too faced scratch marker eyeliner regularly and this product is nothing like what I get when I purchase it from Ulta
customer_reviews.author: kristen carlton

customer_reviews.text: Hate that this isn’t sold in stores anymore. It’s always hard to find. This is my number one eyeliner. Very easy to make a cat eye and to clean up if need be
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is waterproof and last all day. It is easy to remove. I plan to reorder. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: this eyeliner is my favorite and i'm sad ulta no longer carries it. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Korine Tostie

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this product!
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I had purchased at Ulta and could not longer find in the store. Goes on easily, does not smudge for me. It's not 100 % waterproof but holds up all day for me without smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner sucks. It leaves a really weird finished look and you better hope you get your line right the first time cuz a second coat doesn't work it like wipes off. I hate it and wish I didn't waste my money on it
customer_reviews.author: samantha taylor

customer_reviews.title: Getting my hopes up
customer_reviews.text: It came completely dried out. So I went thru hell shipping it back just to buy another in hopes it’s not dried out either.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Goes on smooth and does not smear iff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make up score!
customer_reviews.text: Best make up and cost is the same a Sephora!,
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gould

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: First of all it looks used!!! Second it smells like a permanent marker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof eyeliner marker ever!  Stays on all day, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the sketch marker eyeliner pens. Used Stilla forever till I found these thanks to my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Not for sensitive eyes. Made my eyes burn after just a few seconds of applying
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: True to its description.
customer_reviews.text: goes on smooth and dries quickly. no smear and really is waterproof. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth arellano

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Legit Too Faced product, new and not dried up at all. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and go to the store and buy it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to use in my opinion, and dries out fast. I prefer tarte.
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It may be more expensive than some others, but totally worth it. Easy to use and lasts all day+!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I loved this used while at the beach and had to scrub it off it doesn’t smear or come off easy love it

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting an eyeliner, got an empty box instead.
customer_reviews.author: Morales

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Super waterproof, fine point, gives a perfect straight thin line :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fabara

customer_reviews.title: So easy to apply on yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, goes on so smooth and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ONLY Eye-liner I Use!!
customer_reviews.text: It's THE perfect eyeliner. Goes on smooth and dark. Doesn't come off with humidity, water etc unless you wipe then of course it smears a litttle.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This is the best longest lasting eyeliner brand
customer_reviews.text: This brand at this price is amazing. I can see why it's an Amazon pick. Wish the waterproof one was priced this economically!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Arcini

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely a bargain. I stocked up and bought three, so won't run out of eyeliner for a while. They're very precise and cute and, surprisingly, mostly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Stays all day!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Too Faced eyeliner, Awesome eye liner that stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: The smoothest liquid liner there is!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite liquid liner. I’m sick to death that they have have taken it off the shelves in Ulta!!!
customer_reviews.author: LisaLisa

customer_reviews.title: This really doesn't smear.
customer_reviews.text: Can't define value for money just yet. I haven't finished the liner so don't know how long it will last or if it will dry out. So far it's been rich and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: All day wear
customer_reviews.text: I love this product . Makes a perfect eye line and stays on all day and all night. Applies easily
customer_reviews.author: Stilla1553

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful eyeliner and long lasting . My favorite eyeliner currently definitely a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this eyeliner and Amazon's price makes it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: I would use this as my spare eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: My eyeliner started drying up quickly, i haven’t had it for long and it’s almost completely dry now
customer_reviews.author: Liz Spallone

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: if it isn't perfect the first time I have to remove all my eye make-up so I trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Smokin

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite eyeliner!!! Better than Stila by far. Unfortunately, bought this from Amazon because Too Faced discontinued it and replaced it with Better Than Sex eyeliner that has a brush tip not felt tipped like this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: The Duke's

customer_reviews.title: Draws a line just like liquid!
customer_reviews.text: I love liquid eyeliner but I am reluctant to use pens like this because most of them suck. This one does not. Easy to use and creates a sharp line like liquid does. Stays on and doesn’t smudge. I love this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, sometimes arrives dried out but they’ll replace it
customer_reviews.author: Beenut20

customer_reviews.title: Goes on well
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner goes on really well. My only complaint is that it doesn’t last me as long as other liquid eyeliners I’ve used. Could be that I use it everyday. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Krolikowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not goth, I'm white... according to my 6 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Ladig

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: One week in and it’s still working. Works best with the too faced eyeshadow primer.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Got it for half the price. Glides on my eye. I hardly have to touch my eye lid and it goes on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this brand. I will only purchase this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use if you're just starting with the "cat-eye look". Personally I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by another user......use makeup primer around eyes before and it should stay on
customer_reviews.author: Casey66421

customer_reviews.title: Runs out fast
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much but I hate how fast in runs out
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYELINER PRODUCT YOU'LL EVER USE.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A SUPURB EYELINER PRODUCT -- EVERYTHING AS ADVERTISED !! WILL PURCHASE AGAIN AFTER DISCARDING MY PREVIOUS BRANDS.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer               ustomer == Do NOT use actual name

product_meta.title: Too Faced ‑ Sketch Marker ‑ Eyeliner Waterproof ‑ Black
product_meta.description: Sketch Marker is an innovative liquid eyeliner that’s inspired by Japanese calligraphy pens. Its waterproof formula will not fade or feather, and it features an array of soft pastels to bold pop art shades. Wear just a single color or layer together shades to create a double eyeliner work of art.
feature_bullets: Too Faced Sketch Marker Liquid Art Eyeliner in Black
